description: This header file defines the `HtmlGenerator` class responsible for generating an HTML report that visualizes file access and directory structures. It includes styling, scripting for interactivity, and a method to generate a complete HTML report from a directory tree object. The class encapsulates methods to produce the report, manage errors, and generate HTML content based on a `DirectoryTree` object.

classes.name: HtmlGenerator
classes.description: A utility class that provides static methods to generate an HTML visualization of a directory tree structure, with styling and interactivity

methods.name: bool generate_html_report(const DirectoryTree & tree,const std::string & output_file)
methods.description: Generates a complete HTML report visualization of the provided DirectoryTree object, saving to the specified output file.

methods.name: std::string get_last_error()
methods.description: Returns the last error message encountered during report generation.

search-terms: JavaScript for directory toggle and search

ctags.name: generate_html_report
ctags.pattern: /^    static bool generate_html_report(const DirectoryTree& tree, const std::string& output_file) /
